basic.Peptide Name: Human TC-2 (Chain of Platelet basic protein; Human, mammals, animals)
basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis ATCC6633 (MBC=0.7 µM), Staphylococcus aureus 42D (MBC=11 µM);Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli ML35 (MBC=2.7 µM).Fungi:Cryptococcus neoformans (MFC=30 µM).
